issue.title: Remove header from image.proto. Remove time from image_stamped.proto

content.raw:
I believe native timestamp is only in protobuf3.

Also in protobuf3 is the removal of "required". This means everything is optional.

Take a look at pull request #34. I believe optional data is not serialized. This would lean me towards removing `_stamped` messages in favor of the `header` approach.
content.html:
I believe native timestamp is only in protobuf3.

Also in protobuf3 is the removal of "required". This means everything is optional.

Take a look at pull request #34. I believe optional data is not serialized. This would lean me towards removing _stamped messages in favor of the header approach.
